      Methods in org.springframework.session.data.mongo that return types with arguments of type MongoSession 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<MongoSession> ReactiveMongoOperationsSessionRepository.createSession()
      Creates a new MongoSession that is capable of being persisted by this ReactiveSessionRepository.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<MongoSession> ReactiveMongoOperationsSessionRepository.findById(String id)
      Gets the MongoSession by the Session.getId() or Mono.empty() if no MongoSession is found.
      Map<String,MongoSession> MongoOperationsSessionRepository.findByIndexNameAndIndexValue(String indexName, String indexValue)
      Currently this repository allows only querying against PRINCIPAL_NAME_INDEX_NAME.

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> ReactiveMongoOperationsSessionRepository.save(MongoSession session)
      Ensures the MongoSession created by ReactiveSessionRepository.createSession() is saved.
